panels.description: Displays total CPU usage of all containers
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: Displays sum of memory usage of all containers
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: Displays the number of container restarts for TOP 10 containers with 1 or more restarts
panels.title: TOP Container restarts

panels.description: Displays CPU usage for TOP 10 containers
panels.title: TOP CPU Usage

panels.description: Displays amount of CPU throttling per container
panels.title: CPU Throttling

panels.description: Displays CPU throttling for TOP 10 containers
panels.title: TOP CPU Throttling

panels.description: Displays memory usage and working sets per container
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: Displays memory usage and working sets for TOP 20
panels.title: TOP Memory usage

targets.expr: sum by (pod, container) (rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{cluster="$Cluster", container!="", container!="POD"}[2m])) +  sum by (pod, container) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{cluster="$Cluster", container!="", container!="POD"}[2m]))
